SAIC's MG to open second Europe parts centre by the summerMG Motors, a unit of Chinese automaker SAIC , will open a second European parts centre by the summer of 2024 in France to meet the country's growing demand for its vehicles, a spokesperson told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:21:08 GMT YVLQ7ELQYJJ5DOCN5VWOBWF3EY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/saics-mg-open-second-europe-parts-centre-by-summer-2024-03-14/Gilles Guillaume商业汽车与交通
Zara owner Inditex slashes China stores in digital focusZara-owner Inditex more than doubled its pre-tax profits in China last year even as the fashion retailer scaled back its physical presence, closing a fifth of its stores in the country in a sign its focus on online sales is bearing fruit. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:47:25 GMT V6ZHMXC6LNKTZLMXAC36GYJ3ZY https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/zara-owner-inditex-slashes-china-stores-digital-focus-2024-03-14/Corina Pons, Helen Reid商业零售与消费品
AliExpress targeted in EU probe over possibly illegal online productsAlibaba's AliExpress could face a hefty fine after the European Commission on Thursday launched an investigation into dissemination of potentially illegal and pornographic materials, the third such probe after social media platform X and TikTok. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 13:12:40 GMT RGREXL5FSNO7ROKFVIXXHNP5FI https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-probes-aliexpress-over-possible-illegal-online-products-2024-03-14/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Former Treasury Secretary Mnuchin putting together investors to buy TikTok, CNBC reportsFormer U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin is putting together an investor group to try to buy TikTok, he told CNBC on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:43:56 GMT HIW4OZEG7FMN3IAETVK735GLBE https://www.reuters.com/technology/former-treasury-secretary-mnuchin-putting-together-investors-buy-tiktok-cnbc-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
Europe regulator says will take time needed to approve China jetEurope's air safety regulator will take whatever time is needed to approve China's C919 passenger jet, its top official told Reuters, dampening Beijing's hopes of quickly breaking into a market marked by jet shortages and a Boeing safety crisis. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:24:21 GMT GE3246PQNJKOVFTSITTANRS6K4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/europe-regulator-says-will-take-time-needed-approve-china-jet-2024-03-14/Tim Hepher, Joanna Plucinska商业航空航天与国防
China to host Davis Cup finals group stage matches for first timeChina will host Davis Cup finals group stage matches for the first time in September, the International Tennis Federation (ITF) said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:17:17 GMT 2Y7GQBEMFRO3NC2IC3FC2AXYQQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/china-host-davis-cup-finals-group-stage-matches-first-time-2024-03-14/Reuters运动的网球
Chinese automakers open factories abroad as export clout causes frictionChinese automakers seeking global growth are building more car factories in overseas markets, as foreign regulators mull imposing measures against imports of China-made electric cars. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:47:55 GMT N6B5PQNUPRO4BDZDFIUXDVCQME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automakers-open-factories-abroad-export-clout-causes-friction-2024-03-14/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China's plan to cut downpayments for cars likely to fall flat, analysts sayChina's efforts to boost auto sales by cutting downpayments on car loans stand to be frustrated by a price war and consumer caution, chiefly benefiting a few brands favoured by younger buyers, such as Tesla and Nio , analysts said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:35:01 GMT 5HKIOKC3XNOM3JLRLKTHWMQEPA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-plan-cut-down payments-cars-likely-fall-flat-analysts-say-2024-03-14/Qiaoyi Li, Ziyi Tang, Brenda Goh商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: Trump launched CIA covert influence operation against ChinaTwo years into office, President Donald Trump authorized the Central Intelligence Agency to launch a clandestine campaign on Chinese social media aimed at turning public opinion in China against its government, according to former U.S. officials with direct knowledge of the highly classified operation. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:07:05 GMT JK46K2FQTZJEXCVVG5O43CU7ME https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-launched-cia-covert-influence-operation-against-china-2024-03-14/Joel Schectman, Christopher Bing世界美国

Media harassment after China restaurant blast sparks protest, public criticismThe association overseeing Chinese journalists issued a rare statement of protest after reporters were blocked by local residents and security guards while trying to report on the aftermath of a blast outside Beijing.
